hook.prompt: A CSS file was just modified. Check if the divi5-toolkit plugin's auto_validate setting is enabled in .claude/divi5-toolkit.local.md. If enabled (auto_validate: true), use the divi5-validator agent to quickly validate the CSS for Divi 5 compatibility. Keep the validation brief and non-intrusive - only report critical issues inline. If auto_validate is false or the setting file doesn't exist, skip validation.

Check if .claude/divi5-toolkit.local.md exists. If it does, read the last_research date. If more than 7 days have passed since last research, mention to the user: 'Divi 5 knowledge may be outdated. Run /divi5-toolkit:research for latest updates.' Do not auto-run research, just notify.
